attributes.action: Stop Cold Calling From Outside the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To introduce legislations to stop non uk firms from phoning me morning, noon and night including weekends.I can stop the UK ones via the TPS however more companies are increasing using other countries to do cold calling on their behalf .

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop Cold Calling From Outside the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14945.asp

Prime Minister's Office
